channel.title: Own server from scratch
channel.description: How would i do this? Cuz i want to TRY to make one but not sure if i can cuz dont know much of coding well i do but not totally an expert of java but how would i start out making a server from scratch?... Like what are the steps and everything

item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

You must be a java guru to do that. Plus, you’d have to do the client and it’s cache with sprites and everything from scratch.
Talk about copyrights.
